titlestmt.titleproper: Records of Dunfermline College of Physical Education Old Students Association
titlestmt.subtitle: DCPE Old Students Association
titlestmt.author: Creator of original finding aid unknown.

publicationstmt.publisher: Glasgow University Archive Services on behalf of GASHE project.

profiledesc.creation:
Rachel Hosker, GASHE project archivist (Edinburgh), 21 March 2001, as part of the Research Support Libraries Programme funded project 'Gateway to Archives of Scottish Higher Education'.
The finding aid was XML encoded by Andrew Semple, Administration Assistant,15 June 2001, using a template developed by Lynda Smart, Assistant Archivist using XMetal Version 2.0.
The correspondences between the ISAD(G) elements and the EAD element types, and between EAD element types and MARC fields, were adapted by Pete Johnston, Glasgow University Archive Services, and Paul Watry and Julie Allinson, Liverpool University, Department of Special Collections and Archives, from those recommended in the
EAD Application Guidelines Version 1.0.
Amendments were made by Lynda Smart, Assistant Archivist, Glasgow Unversity Archive Services to update the correspondences between the EAD and ISAD(G) elements so the EAD elements correspond to ISAD(G) Second Edition.
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid was encoded in English.

origination.corpname: Dunfermline College of Physical Education Old Students Association

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: The Old Students Association met at least once a year and dealt with the annual report, the secretary's report, the treasurer's report, membership, yearly record of membership, life membership, committee membership, finances, fees, the establishment of colour awards and discussion of training at the college.

scopecontent.head: Scope and content
scopecontent.p: Records of the Governing Body including minutes 1912-1993, correspondence/papers 1931-1992, annual reports 1907-1995.

custodhist.head: Archival history
custodhist.p: These records have never left the custody of the University. First Transfers of records to the University Archives and Special Collections Division occurred before formal accessioning procedures were put in place.

appraisal.head: Appraisal, destruction and scheduling information
appraisal.p: These records are for permanent retention.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions governing access
accessrestrict.p: By appointment - access to recent official records and records containing confidential information is restricted in accordance with University policies and relevant legislation.

userestrict.head: Conditions governing reproduction
userestrict.p: Usual Conditions: educational use and conditions of documents.
Applications for permission to reproduce images or quote should be sent to Edinburgh University Archivist.

otherfindaid.head: Finding aids
otherfindaid.p: File list in custody of Edinburgh University Archivist.

odd.p:

General International Standard Archival Description Second Edition Ottawa 2000and
National Council on Archives, Rules for the contstruction of personal, place and corporate names 1997
International Standard for Archival Authority Record for Corporate, Place, Family British
UNESCO Thesaurus Education Thesaurus
The creation of this description was assisted by funding from the Research Support Libraries Programme.

did.origination: Dunfermline College of Physical Education Old Students Association

odd.head: Institution
odd.p: Dunfermline College of Physical Education Old Students Association

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Bound volumes include several annual reports. In some cases they do not follow chronologically as years are missing. Included are the committee members, indexes to old students and College staff. Stated are the rules and constitution, financial statements, secretary's reports, minutes, present students' reports, news of College sports fixtures and results and news of old students. The President of the Association also had a page where an editorial was produced.

custodhist.head: Archival history
custodhist.p: The records have never left the custody of the University. The first transfers of records to the University Archives/ Special Collections division occurred before formal accessioning procedures were put in place.

acqinfo.p: Dunfermline College of Physical Education Old Students Association.
